  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_534</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_534</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La medida: magnitud y cantidad</string>
            <string language="en">Measurement: magnitude and quantity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messen: Größe und Quantität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesure : grandeur et quantité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medida: valor e quantidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Misura: grandezza e quantità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση: μέγεθος και ποσότητα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de medida. Se estudian los conceptos de magnitud y cantidad, las escalas y se profundiza en la idea de medida de una superficie.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of measurement. It studies the concepts of magnitude, quantity and measurement scales. It also explains the idea of measuring a surface.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">superficie</string>
            <string language="en">surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cantidad</string>
            <string language="en">quantity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">escala</string>
            <string language="en">scale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">magnitud</string>
            <string language="en">magnitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">unidad</string>
            <string language="en">unit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">medida</string>
            <string language="en">measurement</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept des Messens zu erklären. Es studiert 
die Konzepte Größe, Quantität und Messen-der Skalen. Es 
erklärt auch die Idee des Messens einer Oberfläche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept de la mesure. Elle étudie 
les concepts des échelles de grandeur, de quantité et de mesure. 
Elle explique également l'idée de mesurer une surface.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito da medida. Estuda os conceitos de escalas do valor, 
da quantidade e da medida. Explica também a idéia de medir uma
superfície.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto della misura. Studia i concetti delle scale
di grandezza, di quantità e di misura. Egualmente spiega l'idea
di misurazione della superficie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια της μέτρησης. Μελετά τις έννοιες
των κλιμάκων μεγέθους, ποσότητας και μέτρησης. Εξηγεί 
επίσης την ιδέα της μέτρησης μιας επιφάνειας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Oberfläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quantität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Skala</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
